thread.title: Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US
thread.title_full: Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US

author: ABC News
title: Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US
text:
Winter storm brings biting cold to much of US
The system will stretch 1,500 miles from Kansas to the Northeast, bringing brutal cold across half the country through the weekend and into next week. Some temperatures will dip below zero.
January 2, 2025
